00024 bool BodyDialog::Initialize() {
00025         if (!BodyModel::Initialize())
00026                 return false;
00027         m_bodyPriorsTab.mama  = this;
00028         m_bodyTrackingTab.mama = this;
00029         m_initialized = true;
00030         return true;
00031 }
00032 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 BOOL BodyDialog::OnInitDialog() {
00034         if (!CPropertyPage::OnInitDialog()){ 
00035                 return false;
00036         }       
00037         m_bodyPriorsTab.mama = this;
00038         m_bodyPriorsTab.Create(IDD0, this);
00039         m_bodyParameters.AddSSLPage(m_bodyPriorsTab.name, 0, &m_bodyPriorsTab);
00040         m_bodyTrackingTab.mama = this;
00041         m_bodyTrackingTab.Create(IDD1, this);
00042         m_bodyParameters.AddSSLPage(m_bodyTrackingTab.name, 0, &m_bodyTrackingTab);
00043         return true;
00044 }
00045 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 void BodyDialog::DeInitialize() {
00047         BodyModel::DeInitialize();
00048         
00049         // body size priors
00050         m_heightM = 170;
00051         m_heightS = 20;
00052         m_widthM = 70;
00053         m_widthS = 20;
00054         m_minHeight = 120;
00055         m_maxHeight = 200;
00056         m_minWidth = 40;
00057         m_maxWidth = 100;
00058 
00059         // tracking parameters
00060         m_iterations = 20;
00061         m_iterationsPerBody = 6;
00062         m_randomness = 0.25;
00063         m_maxDoorDistance = 200;
00064         m_invisibleFor = 30;
00065         m_dormantFor = 100;
00066         m_outsiderFor = 30; 
00067         m_distanceConfidence = 60;
00068 
00069         // prior probability penlties
00070         p_BodyOverlap = 0.3;
00071         m_BodyMinDist = 0.5;
00072         p_ObstacleOverlap = 0.2;
00073         p_number = 0;
00074         p_new = 1;
00075         p_delete = 1;
00076         p_distance = 0.1;
00077         p_height = 0.1;
00078         p_width = 0.1;
00079         p_color = 0.1;
00080         p_background = 1; 
00081         p_foreground = 1; 
00082         p_abnormalW = 0.1;
00083         p_abnormalH = 0.1;
00084 
00085 
00086         // jump-diffusion probabilities
00087         p_add = 0.1;
00088         p_remove = 0.1;
00089         p_exchange = 0.1;
00090         p_update = 0.2;
00091         p_diffuse = 0.3;
00092 
00093         // Kalman parameters
00094         m_posModelNoise = 1;
00095         m_posMeasurementNoise = 50;
00096         m_orientModelNoise = 1e-3;
00097         m_orientMeasurementNoise = 1;
00098 
00099         // Tracking control parameters
00100         m_saturationTime = 15;
00101         m_maxHistChange = 0.2;
00102         m_maxPosChange = 10;
00103         m_maxDeletedAge = 20;
00104         m_maxDeletedDist = 200;
00105 }

00107 void BodyDialog::BodyPriorsTab::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX) {
00108         // BUG: parameters are all zeroes ; if not usin safe wnd crashes!
00109         //BodyDialog* mama = (BodyDialog*)GetParent()->GetSafeHwnd();
00110         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_HEIGHTM, mama->m_heightM);
00111         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_HEIGHTS, mama->m_heightS);
00112         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_WIDTHM, mama->m_widthM);
00113         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_WIDTHS, mama->m_widthS);
00114         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_HEIGHTMIN, mama->m_minHeight);

00116         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_WIDTHMIN, mama->m_minWidth);
00117         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_WIDTHMAX, mama->m_maxWidth);
00118 
00119         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PNONE, mama->p_number);
00120         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PNEW, mama->p_new);
00121         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PDELETE, mama->p_delete);
00122         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PDISTANCE, mama->p_distance);
00123         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_PHEIGHT, mama->p_height);

00165 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00166 void BodyDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00167 {
00168         CPropertyPage::DoDataExchange(pDX);
00169         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_BODYTAB, m_bodyParameters);
00170         if (m_bodyParameters.GetSSLActivePage() >=0 ) {
00171                 m_bodyPriorsTab.UpdateData(pDX->m_bSaveAndValidate);
00172                 m_bodyTrackingTab.UpdateData(pDX->m_bSaveAndValidate);
00173         }
00174 }

00178         if( ar.IsStoring()) {
00179                 ar << m_heightM << m_heightS << m_widthM << m_widthS;
00180                 ar << m_minHeight << m_maxHeight << m_minWidth << m_maxWidth << m_iterations << m_iterationsPerBody << m_randomness;
00181                 ar << m_posModelNoise << m_posMeasurementNoise << m_orientModelNoise << m_orientMeasurementNoise;
00182                 ar << m_maxDoorDistance << m_invisibleFor << m_outsiderFor << m_distanceConfidence;
00183                 ar << p_BodyOverlap << m_BodyMinDist << p_ObstacleOverlap;
00184                 ar << p_number << p_new << p_delete << p_distance << p_height << p_width;
00185                 ar << p_color << p_background << p_foreground << p_abnormalW << p_abnormalH;
00186                 ar << p_add << p_remove << p_exchange << p_update << p_diffuse;
00187                 ar << m_saturationTime << m_maxHistChange << m_maxPosChange << m_maxDeletedAge << m_maxDeletedDist;
00188 
00189         }
00190         else {
00191                 ar >> m_heightM >> m_heightS >> m_widthM >> m_widthS;
00192                 ar >> m_minHeight >> m_maxHeight >> m_minWidth >> m_maxWidth >> m_iterations >> m_iterationsPerBody >> m_randomness;
